products.name: 11-inch Tablet Pro 2020 Space Gray
products.sub-description: Your next computer is not a computer.
products.description: The iPad Pro is a magical piece of glass. It has pro cameras that can transform reality. You can use it with touch, pencil, keyboard and now trackpad. With the A12Z Bionic chip, iPad Pro outpaces most PC laptops today. Liquid Retina display features ProMotion, True Tone, and industry‑leading colour accuracy.
more info: 11-inch Liquid Retina display with ProMotion, True Tone and industry‑leading colour accuracy
A12Z Bionic chip with 8 Core Graphics for fast performance
Wi-Fi 6 connectivity with Face ID authentication
Dual camera system: 10MP Ultra Wide + 12MP Wide cameras
LiDAR Scanner for advanced augmented reality experiences
Five studio-quality microphones and four speaker audio system
Magic Keyboard and Smart Keyboard Folio support

products.slug: 12 Piece Dinner Set, Ivory Charcoal & Terracotta
products.name: 12 Piece Dinner Set, Ivory Charcoal & Terracotta
products.description: This 12-piece dinner set combines three timeless earth tones in a harmonious blend of Ivory, Charcoal, and Terracotta. Crafted from premium stoneware composite, each piece features hand-brushed textures and a matte glaze finish that resists fingerprints while maintaining exceptional durability. The set is microwave-safe, oven-friendly up to 220°C, and dishwasher-safe for everyday convenience.
more info: Contains: 4 Dinner Plates (27cm), 4 Salad Plates (20cm), 4 Soup Bowls (500ml)
Color Palette: Ivory base with Charcoal accents & Terracotta detailing
Resistant to chipping and thermal shock
Food-safe glaze certified by FDA standards

products.name: Technic Bugatti Chiron 42083 Building Set

Functional W16 engine with moving pistons
Bugatti logo and signature color scheme
